name: HeadDesk
description:
(I couldn't manage to resize the WEBGL version's screen size. You can press F11 after opening the game to make it fullscreen/ WEBGL versiyonunun pencere boyutunu ayarlayamadığım için büyük koymak zorunda kaldım. Oyunu açtıktan sonra F11e basarsanız tam ekran olacaktır.)

This game is made for Bogazici Game Jam

It's a simple card game where you want to keep your stats balanced. Every card has an effect on your stats. There are 12 cards and 2 types of cards.

Basic Cards: Adds or Decreases points to your specific stats.

Multiplier Cards: Adds multiplication value to your stats that turn. For example, if you play the 'Therapy' card and 'Video Games'card the same turn; you'll get more happiness from the 'Video Games' card. 

Credits:

Ömer Akçalı- Game design and development

Yağmur Okur - Game Artist

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/peaceful-1am-in-may

Font:https://www.dafont.com/minecraft.font
